channel.title: Is Durial or Cursed_You C0MING Back?
channel.description:
MASSACURE:
[IMG]http://i193.photobucket.com/albums/z144/Blueangels50/massacure.jpg[/img]
Everybody,
Im sure your all aware of the runescape masacure. There was 2 people there called:
-Durial -cursed_you
Both combat 126
Now I want you ALL to read this as carefully as you can. Me and Chemical found it really creepy, it's one of the scariest thing's ive seen even though it's from a game.
-People say the runescape masacure happened from a giltch, by accident! but the truth is it wasn't by accident. Weve found enoughf evidence to get you thinking, as for this is no joke.
On the 6/6/06 the runescape masacure was filmed, when the glitch happened. Known to what we know was done by these 2 players, on that mysterious date, which im sure your all aware of what it is.
The glitch some how, made it so people could "kill" each other.
Durial321 made an account on youtube called, durial321, the person that we think made this glitch, on the date of 6/6/06, Check this out, on the vid made about masacure, check out what he posted. look carefully.
[IMG]http://i193.photobucket.com/albums/z144/Blueangels50/massacures.jpg[/img]
He made a random post, and look at how many hour's it was when he posted, 666 not 111.But how was there still mysteriosly 111? a glitch? no I dont think so. But they posted at 111 hours, this happend in world 111
[IMG]http://i193.photobucket.com/albums/z144/Blueangels50/durial.jpg[/img]
People are saying hes coming back with a glitch
[IMG]http://i193.photobucket.com/albums/z144/Blueangels50/omfg.jpg[/img]
Hes in that picture, taken after the masacure, but he was banned? hes there?
check up durial321 on the high scores, if you pass him in runescape logout immediatly.
Here is something to get you thinking, the new thing posted on runescape.com after he said he is going to put a virus on there, look at the thing posted in the runescape announcment's. Scary?
Also watch this: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wt4bq6qfScE
Put the music on aswell it blend's in. On tip it, they have an interveiw about durial, even there shakey about him
Something is going on, it's all done on 666, just like the day omen was made.

item.title: Is Durial or Cursed_You C0MING Back?
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

[quote=“Andrew, post:109, topic:147388”]Dude, seriously, come on. We all know this is fake. But it entertained me, A for effort.
I used to be in the clan the Elite Order. We are broken up.
We used to be allied with the clan 3v0lution X. We were
all very close. If you do not know 3v0lution X, it has the famous Jake Bludda.
I never had a close relationship to Durial but he was in the clan, and let me tell
you the REAL story. Durial is (was) a bloodthirsty pker. When he found this glitch,
his main intention was to fulfill the dream of a pker: being able to attack ANYONE
in sight. Let me ask you, what would you do if you discovered this glitch?

Also, the chances of this happening again are 0. Even if you could attack anyone, they wouldn’t drop anything.[/quote]
While that is true, there is a chance, and they might drop something. I am having fun with these tags!

Read full topic
item.source: Is Durial or Cursed_You C0MING Back?

item.title: Is Durial or Cursed_You C0MING Back?
item.dc:creator: @Andrew Andrew
item.description:
@Andrew wrote:

Dude, seriously, come on. We all know this is fake. But it entertained me, A for effort.
I used to be in the clan the Elite Order. We are broken up.
We used to be allied with the clan 3v0lution X. We were
all very close. If you do not know 3v0lution X, it has the famous Jake Bludda.
I never had a close relationship to Durial but he was in the clan, and let me tell
you the REAL story. Durial is (was) a bloodthirsty pker. When he found this glitch,
his main intention was to fulfill the dream of a pker: being able to attack ANYONE
in sight. Let me ask you, what would you do if you discovered this glitch?

Also, the chances of this happening again are 0. Even if you could attack anyone, they wouldn’t drop anything.

Read full topic
item.source: Is Durial or Cursed_You C0MING Back?

item.title: Is Durial or Cursed_You C0MING Back?
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

[quote=“fluffymuff1n, post:107, topic:147388”][quote author=cooper link=topic=201491.msg2063625#msg2063625 date=1203390723]

i ment that he did a awsome thing, killing ppl outside of wildy and becoming a god hes even still remembered, id do it even if losing my account

Chances are that will not happen again, though.
[/quote]
It could if all the children in the world, grabbed each others hands, and sang. But half of them then would die of aids by the Africans/Asians.[/quote]
World peace brings death.

Silly human, AIDs isn’t limited to Africa/Asia, America and Australia and Europe [and maybe some researchers of Antarctica] have it too.

[quote=“dragonfire455, post:100, topic:147388”]i salute Durial321, ppl that call him a asshole or a noob, well you would do the same!
he was the one who broke down the barrier on runescape, many items were lost, but a new ledgend was born.
If it does happen on August 8th, 2008, ill bhe there, and ill fight to then end, even if i get banned.[/quote]
What barrier do you speak of?

Read full topic
item.source: Is Durial or Cursed_You C0MING Back?

@Lin wrote:

Planet Hell ftw I saw this a looong time ago back in RS. I actually once got the glitch in POH when they first came out, but I died due to a fag’s poisoning… Anyways I got poisoned in a fight in a house at low hp, got kicked out, and it said Attack on a right click, but I died right away. Then it got removed. And anyways, it’s probably a lie.
